title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Hypermedia-Based Distance Education Mathematics Pedagogy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematics lesson designs utilizing hypermedia materials (nonlinear content, multimedia)
Learners develop blended learning operation plans using collaboration tools and digital platforms (e.g., Google Classroom, Padlet) in BYOD environments
Learners design hyperlink-based activities (e.g., concept map connections, problem-solving sequences) to promote learner interaction in remote education settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
